measures.goal: Keep cases to a minimum from outside sources.
measures.measure: Beijing is directing some inbound flights from their capital airport to other airports.

measures.goal: Keep cases to a minimum from outside sources.
measures.measure: Beijing is now diverting all flights to fight the virus.

measures.goal: Keep cases to a minimum from outside sources.
measures.measure: Beijing is asking people who are flying into Beijing to fill in a health declaration form. Also the flights will be diverted to other cities.

measures.goal: To slow the spread of the virus
measures.measure: People had to keep a 1 to 2 meter distance as to not infect other people with the corona virus. Facemasks in public are mandatory.

measures.goal: Keep cases to a minimum from outside the city.
measures.measure: Beijing city officials will now conduct a thorough examination of those who are now undergoing home quarantine.

measures.goal: To stop the spread of the virus amongst children.
